enchantment.modtech_arsenal.micro_missil: This weapon fires a high-speed projectile in a straight line
enchantment.modtech_arsenal.prime_chambe: First bullet after reload causes 1.5x damage and +1 pierce
enchantment.modtech_arsenal.reconstructi: Slowly reloads itself over time, up to double capacity
enchantment.modtech_arsenal.recombinatio: Final blows caused by sword or magic increase the damage of this weapon's next shot
Refills part of the magazine from inventory on weapon kills
